item.title: CVE-2023-51358|2023-12-29T12:11:07.514Z -- bright%20plugins -- block%20ips%20for%20gravity%20forms
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Bright Plugins Block IPs for Gravity Forms.This issue affects Block IPs for Gravity Forms: from n/a through 1.0.1.
